name: Ink'd
description:
Play as Bubbles, an intelligent octopus being experimented on in a mad scientist's lab who must use her stretchy arms to escape the facility and free her friends!

Trailer:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/16UXej-_Hxxt2vl3_RA1b-KpqMj0wNlY2/view

 Key Features:

  • Wacky Physics Based Movement
  • Unique and Unconventional Controls
  • Short and Sweet Levels
  • Chaotic and Cartoony Aesthetic
